column4: went to be with the lord surrounded by his loving family on june 16
column5: 2015. ed retired from goodyear aerospace. funeral services will be saturday at 10 am in the funeral home where friends may call friday from 6-8 pm. burial will be in greentown cemetery. for more information visit us at: www. schneeberger. funeral. comschneeberger330-456-8237. published in akron beacon journal on june 18
